title: What is the answer to this problem, (a+b) (c+d)? - Quora

response.answer_text: What is the answer to this problem: (a+b)(c+d)?  by the FOIL method. Another way is to distribute the expression in the first pair of parentheses through the terms of the expression in the second pair:

Well, there is no answer. That is because, as phrased, this is not a problem. A problem takes the form of stuff on the left = stuff on the right (note: the “equals” sign in the middle). Do you mean what does the expression reduce to when multiplied out? If so, then the answer is
